page.title: 15Life today in Coddenham Area
page.content: Home life in the villages of Coddenham and Hemingstone is probably much more comfortable in the 1980's than even only 30 years ago; until then there was no main drainage. Electricity is now widely available enabling most people to have televisions, washing machines, freezers and refrigerators. Many homes have videos and Hi-Fi's and some a computer. Relative income levels are much higher than in earlier years. Most families have a car and with an adequate bus service, people living here nowadays are able to enjoy a much fuller life. Inside homes in this area life goes on in much the same way as urban areas. Most people now live in the country because they choose to do so; in earlier years they had no choice as they depended on agriculture for their living. Many homes have pets & a few keep chickens.
